item.title: Sprint 1
item.description: Sprint 1 Sprint Goal Make a new repository through the API (Success) Sprint Backlog Model View Controller Running Terraform through Java Integrate Terraform Diff repositories Implement automated Email Schedule Sprint Period: 23 - 29 April Daily Scrum Time: 08:30 in team room Sprint Demo: 29 April, 09:45 in Sal C Assigned Team Murat Eksi E-Joon Ko Kyle Sinclair Kok Siang Ng Jonatan Holmbäck Reshad Sarwar Justin Arieltan Pontus Asp
item.content:
Sprint 1

Sprint Goal

  • Make a new repository through the API (Success)

Sprint Backlog

  • Model View Controller
  • Running Terraform through Java
  • Integrate Terraform
  • Diff repositories
  • Implement automated Email

Schedule

Sprint Period: 23 - 29 April
Daily Scrum Time: 08:30 in team room
Sprint Demo: 29 April, 09:45 in Sal C

Assigned Team

  • Murat Eksi
  • E-Joon Ko
  • Kyle Sinclair
  • Kok Siang Ng
  • Jonatan Holmbäck
  • Reshad Sarwar
  • Justin Arieltan
  • Pontus Asp
